publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2466 Mr David Davidson: Montrose Air Station Heritage Trust—That the Parliament welcomes the Heritage Lottery Fund award of £30,600 to Montrose Air Station Heritage Trust; congratulates all those involved in developing the museum, restoring original equipment and applying for the funds; wishes the Trust every success as it begins the task of using the funds to develop and maintain its important and historic collection, and further welcomes the injection of lottery monies into the north east and looks forward to the area receiving a greater share of lottery funding in future. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2466 Montrose Air Station Heritage Trust (lodged on 23 February 2005) Mr Brian Monteith*
